body:
On Trilinos 12.12.1, Spack will fail to install when compiling with OpenMP support if the compiler is gcc@9.3.0. 


```console
$ spack install trilinos@12.12.1 %gcc@9.3.0 +openmp
...
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
```console
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1768-fa614404e
* **Python:** 3.6.7
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake_avx512
```

### Additional information
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4919941/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4919942/spack-build-out.txt)

@aprokop 
@keitat 
### General information
<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: Trilinos
